snippet: The State Legislature approved the use of marijuana for medical purposes on Monday, and Gov. Martin O’Malley has said he would sign the measure.
abstract: Maryland State Legislature approves use of marijuana for medical purposes, and Gov Martin O'Malley says he will sign measure.
lead_paragraph: The State Legislature approved the use of marijuana for medical purposes on Monday, and Gov. Martin O’Malley has said he would sign the measure.

headline.seo: Maryland: Marijuana Measure Sent to Governor
headline.main: Marijuana Measure Sent to Maryland Governor
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Marijuana Measure Sent To Governor
